description:
Austin Wilde is having sort of a weird day. Not only did he wake up in a hospital after being in a coma for about two weeks, but when he finally comes to, he finds out he's got someone else's arm attached to him. And this isn't some helping hand or a case of letting the fingers do the talking... no- this is one mean motherfucking hand. And when it's not strangling the life out of its unsuspecting victim/carrier, it likes to satisfy its sexual cravings for hot juicy dick. Well Austin can definitely oblige you there Mean Mr. Hand.

Enjoy!
title: Armed & Dangerous
